doc.after: Jamaica is a mixed economy with both state enterprises and private sector businesses Major sectors of the Jamaican economy include agriculture mining manufacturing tourism and financial and insurance services Tourism and mining are the leading earners of foreign exchange Half the Jamaican economy relies on services with half of its income coming from services such as tourism An estimated 1 3 million foreign tourists visit Jamaica every year 96
